content.detailedDescription:
It���s an integral part of being.

	while living in palms, california sometime during 1995, i began my ufo education. i was taught how to spot them in the sky. i was taught to differentiate between them and stars, satellites, planets and planes. they simulate these things so that it is easier to drift thru our skies. 
	i was living alone although cayce (kayceo) did come to live with me that year. i began to notice that a certain star would appear and disappear at the same times each night while the other stars would remain still. this one particular star also did things that the others never did. it shot out little orange lights and hovered. it also communicated with other red lights in the sky. i assume that these were smaller related vessels. i didn���t know much about ufo���s at the time but i did have a firm belief in the probability of their existence. i was 18. 
	i remember watching them while outside on my balcony. one night i asked, ���what do you want from us? why can���t you just leave us alone?��� that���s very funny to me now. anyway i turned around to go inside after asking the strange star that question and before i could get both feet in the door i heard a loud mail voice in my head say, ���it���s an integral part of being.��� i repeated what i had just heard a couple of times aloud. i ran to the dictionary to look up the word integral because i didn���t know what it meant. it means necessity for completeness. thank you but the last thing i expected to receive was a response. from that point on i trusted that the strange stars were not stars at all.  
	in 1998 i channeled for the first time in my life. i was now living in venice, ca. i was on my way out the door of my friend strider���s  house when suddenly some dear old friends began to chime in. i call them the intergalactic federation of light. beings of light and love from all over this universe and beyond whose job is to help maintain order without interfering very much or at all. this meeting had been pre-planned and was not in any way an intrusion into my reality. i expected it and welcomed them. they were very excited and speaking over each other. i became flustered and asked that they speak one at a time. strider asked questions. he asked when they would be coming to see us. we felt that we needed to see them because although we believed and knew that they were real, we also knew that our logical minds would need more proof before being able to truly accept the reality of their being without doubt or question.  strider offered to meet them in the desert. i rejected that proposal since the ocean was much closer. one of the entities said, ���ok see you soon. one month by the lagoon.��� three weeks later i asked strider the virgo if it had yet been a month and he snapped gruffly, ���no, it���s only been three weeks!��� the following friday (sometime i think in november of 1998) my friend and co-worker charlie, led strider and i up the side of this hill just past topanga canyon over pch. charlie also brought two dogs. egypt and i could never remember that other dogs name. charlie was not too aware of ufo���s but she was open to it. strider was working at ufo central in venice at the time and i was working at the psychic eye as was charlie. 	
    as soon as the sun went down i spotted the first one. as usual strider proceeded to argue with me about it. he tried to tell me that it was just a star. he put his hand up as if to measure it against the other stars in the sky and at that very moment all the stars over our heads fell out of the sky and disappeared. that tripped me out because i really had thought that those were all stars. then in my head i hear someone say, ���that was the first of 80���. after that we saw so many different types of craft. it was really awesome. there was telepathic communication going on throughout the experience. we had sat and watched the flight paths for a while before the sun went down so we new that these craft were not on the flight paths. we saw what looked like the mother of the stealth bomber. we also saw a large craft that looked exactly like  a rocket ship except that it flew side-ways like an airplane. we saw one really large round ship with lights all around it. we saw one very odd craft. it looked like one of those 4th of july sparklers. it was long and skinny stick like craft which had big bright sparklers at each end. i have seen a similar effect on planes but those sparklers flash these did not. so many craft. there were also orbs, little robotic spies. the list goes on and on. i can hardly remember all the different types of craft that we saw. at one point we were sitting me in the midddle, strider at my left and charlie at my right. we were all looking in different directions at one point while trying to get the others attention. this seemed to go on for hours. strider says about two hours although i felt like we were out there for six. at some point strider walked away into the darkness. he was gone for about ten minutes before i began to worry about him and yell his name. suddenly charlie, the dogs and i hear footsteps. i yell out, ���strider, is that you?��� no response. ���strider?��� 


suddenly the figure coming toward us came into view. it looked as if the mountain was coming toward us. the dogs growled. charlie and i confirmed that we were both seeing the same thing. the closer the figure got the clearer it became. strider who was wearing a tan poncho, looked as if he had camouflaged with the natural surroundings and the mountain. he smiled deviously. i said sarcastically, ���why didn���t you answer me? you shit, you scared us. you totally morphed with the mountain it was crazy it looked like the mountain was walking toward us.��� close to the end of the night i realized that some of our friends were probably around us and yet undetectable to our eyes. soon after that realization we began to see what i call the invisible people. i say invisible because you could only see the outlines of people it is difficult to explain.  we began wandering around the mountain that we were on. we began to notice that certain spots were much warmer than others. we could walk in and out of these warm spots or stand half in and half out. it was strange. after a while the warm spot would get cold and we would move until we found another one. we did that a few times before we left.
	the last event of the evening was when i was told telepathically that someone was waiting to meet us at the top of this hill. i lead our group to the hill and began walking up it. i had not given charlie or strider any explanation for why we were walking up the side of a mountain without a path but they gladly followed none the less. about a quarter of the way up i decided not to continue. i stopped and turned around. at that moment strider screamed, ���damn it!!!��� i jumped and said, ���what?!��� then he said, ���they just told me that it was up to you if we would go and you stopped and turned around.��� i just smiled and apologized. i wasn���t in the mood for poison ivy and mountain climbing besides we had a great night and i wasn���t sure if we were already overloaded on the experience. so i just decided to take a rain check with our friends. i���d like to take this moment to thank them.  thanx���.
	by the way, strider went back to work at ufo central that monday. he and his co-workers received many strange activity in the sky reports from people in the topanga/ malibu area.
	
the woman with no white around her eyes���.

	about one month or so after the ufo sightings over pch  (approximately december 98��� or january 1999) i had an encounter with a woman from another world. i was working at the psychic eye bookshop at the time. it was probably a sunday because i liked to work in the annex on sunday���s. the annex was the used section of the bookstore. i was standing behind the counter at the register as was strider and paul. strider was to my right and paul was to his right.  paul was always skeptical about our sightings. three years after this incident, it occurred to me that i could have totally gotten fired for allowing the guys back behind the counter. it was not something i normally would allow but in hind sight the only way the fellas would have been able to see what was about to take place. suddenly a very tall, thin caucasian woman came around the corner from the main side of the store. i knew that she was headed right for me. she was bald, wearing sunglasses, a white wife beater, khaki shorts and sandals. she was also holding a stack of flyers. as she began to speak to me she took off her glasses. strider and paul for once were silent. she asked me if she could put her flyer up on our bulletin board. i, always surprised at how calm i can be in extraordinary situations, casually responded by saying, ���no, i���m sorry that is only for our psychics. people ask all the time.��� she said thank you. put on her sunglasses and left. paul started talking as if he hadn���t just seen what we know he did so strider and i at the same exact time said woe woe woe back it up. it took paul a couple years to admit to me that there was something very odd about the tall lady. strider and i spoke about where she may have been from. why? because although her eyes were shaped like a human���s, they were anything but. as a matter of fact they looked like the eyes of a grey alien. where we have pink her eyes were charcoal grey. there was no white around her eyes either. they were a filmy black color with a slimy looking texture. definitely not hollywood makeup. i grew up around the biggest special effects guy in hollywood and this was not his work. unfortunately we never got a look at the flyer because we were too busy being mesmerized by her eyes.
	about an hour later i was sitting outside taking a break when i spot that woman walking with a man and a tiny chihuahua. they were walking down main street in venice toward rose ave. i was across the street thinking about how odd they appeared. they were both wearing identical outfits and they were like carbon copies of each other. both the exact same height and build. both bald. the only difference was that you could tell one was female because she had breasts. they appeared to be acting as if they were boyfriend and girlfriend but once i realized that we didn���t have male and female identical twins on this planet i knew that they were alien. i immediately began speaking to them telepathically. without a word, i said, ��� i know that you can hear me. i know that you can read my thoughts.��� at that very moment they both stopped and turned and looked at me in unison. i said, ���thank you. thank you very much.��� and they walked away.
	one week after that while sitting in my car at lunch with jaeneen the store manager, i had another encounter. jaeneen and i would often sit in my car (ethal may) during lunch. we rarely ever spoke or listened to music. we were just so happy to be away from the madness of the bookstore that we would just sit in silence. this day we were parked in front of the ocean exactly two blocks away from the eye. i am the type of person who is always looking around and in my mirrors even while at a standstill. i had just did my momentary security sweep of the situation and there were no humans to be found in any direction. i had looked around, i looked in both my side mirrors and then finally my rear view. the moment that my eyes shifted away from the rear view mirror two car doors slammed. the tall woman, her identical male twin and the tiny chihuahua dog all got out of the green car behind us. the woman walked by my side in the street and gave me a glance. the man and the dog walked around the passenger side and down the sidewalk. perplexed i asked janeen if she had heard the car doors open. she said, ���no��� and i said, ���neither did i.���  a silly question because they literally had no time to get to the car, get in and then get out between the time i had looked away from the mirror and heard the car doors slam. then i asked.  ���do you remember me telling you about those people from earlier this week?��� jaeneen said, ���yes��� then i said, ���that���s them��� jaeneen just said ���nooo��� nervously. then she asked, ���what do you think they want?��� i said, ���i don���t know. i think they want to talk to me but either they aren���t ready to talk to me or they don���t think i���m ready to talk to them. either way as long as they keep walkin we���ll be alright.��� and they did. i haven���t seen them since. that was probably january of 1999. shortly thereafter i flipped out and quick that crazy job. i just couldn���t take anymore. there were so many strange occurrences at that place. one time a guy actually accused me of swelling up his feet. i���m not makin this stuff up. i promise. i���m not that creative. trust me. he said, ���i came into this store the other day and you walked by me wearing that star of david and now my feet are swollen.��� 
i wear a star of david religiously although i am currently jamaican irish french english african american cherokee indian jew :)

2005 copyright alexis nichele

content.detailedDescription: at 6 pm pst on 12/21/06 my wife came in through the front door of our house and asked,"do you want to see a ufo?"  i followed her out the door and immediatly saw a unfamiliar light in in the southeastern sky. it was over bear butte area in southern humbolt county. the light would rise in the sky and then seem to waft down like a falling leaf. all the time chaging color but more like several colors changing at once. the light appeared not to shine outside of itself. we watched it for approximatly 15 minutes. at 1820 i walked to my neighbors house and asked if he wanted to see. my wife and i have seen it on two other occasions in the past 4 weeks and had mentioned it to our neighbors. when we,returned we had to stand 15feet left of where we could we stood earlier to view the object. the object then started going back and forth, fast in a northerly direction then back south but moving very slow and steady.I then said aloud in a non-threatning voice "we can see you, please give us a sign if you are real." the object emmited a bluish pink lighting like flash that filled the sky. just then my other neighbor came up and ask ," what the f was that. the four of us proceded to watch the ariel display for approx. 30 minutes. our visibility was getting poor due to storm system in the area. we loaded up in my truck to see if we could go up the ridge and get above the clouds. unfortunately we could not. however we could see the clouds illuminated , like the ambient light on the clouds over a small city, on the butte to our south. the illumination appeared to rise and fall in the bank of clouds. we watched this for more then an hour. by now it was raining heavily so we returned home. while we stood outside talking about our experience, that was spiritual for neighbor 2, and needed to rationly explained by neighbor 1, we heard two jet fly bys 30 seconds apart. we thought this odd because we have no airport withi 75 miles that supports jet traffic. also the weather seemed very bad for flying low. like i have said above we have seen this object on other occaisions. we know of at least 10 other people who have seen it ,some of whom see it frequently. yesterday i was encouraged to "report it to mufon"
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Light moving by unknown means changing in intensity and color.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi there, 

i am writing to you not knowing how to put this simply, so i will start from the beginning.

i am a 30 year old male living in calgary alberta i moved here from the uk when i was 17 years old.  i guess this starts off when i was listening to coast to coast radio, they were talking about sightings, i find this subject very interesting as i had a sighting myself in montana driving back from grand forks n.D, with a friend  (he was attending university there) i have told this story many times to many people, it was summer 1997 late at night we had been driving straight and we were on a secondary highway no street lights, all of a sudden the stars started to blink out, i didn���t see the them directly, more out of my peripheral vision. i looked up and there was a massive noiseless  black triangle right above the car, my friend was sleeping i turned and shook him violently and shouted blake blake  look look, the craft was so fast by the time my friend came to it was disappearing over a hill or mountain range several miles away, without even cutting the air for noise, you could hear absolutely nothing from it. i asked my friend if he seen it, he said he seen nothing.

 i asked him the same question just this past summer, this time he said��� well he seen some lights but it could have been anything. i don���t know if he did see that the first time and just didn���t want to say, however i have told that story many times, but just recently for one reason or another it dawned on me, i don���t think i was driving a hundred plus kilometers an hour with the window down at night time and yet i know it was because the fact that there was no noise whatsoever was so irregular that that fact struck me like a hammer, not only that, now i think about it i don���t remember stopping the car i do remember looking up at it through the ���open window��� and getting a good look at it, although i don���t remember it well which bothers me, and i know it was moving far to fast for me to get a good of a look as i did.

my memory seems to be irregular about this event, the little things don���t add up for me.

last year my wife and i were in bed, i was in that state where i was almost about to fall asleep when there was a great bright white blue flash in my room, i wasn���t sure if i had dreamed it i was about to ask my wife (not knowing if she was asleep or not) if she seen that? when she asked the same question, again no noise with the flash.

there are a few more things i won���t go in to, too many little details 

i just sent an email off inquiring about hypnotic regression do you think this is advisable? i desperately want to know if something was done to me

have you heard of other sightings like this are they common? 

yours truly 

gary foreman 

calgary alberta
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:30 pm la time on december 22nd, 2006, i was driving home from work up the 5 north towards the 134 interchange and to my left/west i saw a very odd sight.  the best i could make out was a helicopter with flashing lights/strobes and then what appeared to be another flying vehicle in front of it, possibly nose to nose.  please keep in mind that it was dark and i was at a distance of about a 1/4 mile, so i really couldn't make out any real shape of either vehicle.  the lights on the helicopter were as you would image, but the ufo had three constant lights in a triangular formation.  after nearly getting hit in traffic because i looking more at the lights than the road, i pulled into the breakdown lane.  from this vantage point i sat for approximately 2 minutes nearly across from them and watched the vehicles in their stationary position.  i'm new to the area, but i'm guessing these crafts were on the east side of where the griffith observatory would be - 1/4 mile west of the 5, past the colorado exit.

while observing from the side of the road, the crafts appeared to be nose to nose, i couldn't hear any noise over the traffic sounds, and i'd guess they were in very close proximity, 20 feet or so.  these crafts sat stationary for a minute or so while i was parked and i didn't notice any movement between them for most of that time and then i began to see that there was a little more distance and shifting in positioning for about 20 seconds as they began to move north slightly - the distance shifting would have been something like under 20 feet.  at no time did i visually notice the ufo below, above or appearing to being suspended beneath the helicopter.    

as the crafts continued to move faster to the northwest, they appeared to still be nose to nose and once they passed the 134/5 split they picked up a substanial amount of speed going to the northwest (helicopter fast).  my first thoughts about the helicopter and ufo was that it was nighttime filming and that the ufo was actually a filming platform, but if that was so, i would have thought it would have been suspended and by regulation should have had strobes on it.  furthermore, when i've seen filming by helicopters in the past (about 10 times while living in the glendale area), there are usually 3 helicopters involved and keeping a formation.  last night i scanned the skies while the crafts were stationary and as they flew away, and didn't see any other crafts in the immediate vicinity.  i did attempt a cellphone photo while i was across from it and it was stationary, but all i got was a black photo, no image appeared due to the distance.  

i've had 2 or 3 other ufo sightings in the past 30 years of my life and will try to document them as soon as i can.  these other sightings occured mainly in great barrington, massachusetts, the berkshires of western ma.
content.summary: Helicopter nose to nose with ufo - stationary then leaving in tandem

content.detailedDescription:
My merkabah experience

on january 7, 2002, i was having another one of those conversations with my friend derek.  this time we had an intellectual conversation regarding the interpretation of events in our realities and how useful it really is to define our experiences.  no matter how advanced the definitions might be, we may somewhat loose the experience in a mist of other visions.  we may loose the experience by intellectualising.  

we applied the argument to the experience and idea of merkabah in particular.  what became clear to me is that derek has seen wheels within wheels (spoken about in the bible) opening in the sky, and he believed.  at that stage, i was weary of definition, as i had not experienced something that had to be defined as merkabah only.  

but what a surprise it turned out to be the next morning when i had such an enriching experience of opening my eyes up and immediately gazing on something that made me eat my words.  i really felt that without the idea of merkabah i would not have been able to understand the beating heart of light that was flashing outside my window.  i had woken up without any conscious prefabrication and seen something undeniable that lasted for a half hour in the sky.

in front of my very eyes hovered a sphere of immense dimensions (about an acre of sky) and it silently flashed brighter and duller for half an hour before i had to leave and get on with my busy day.  part of it was covered by a very, low-hanging cloud and it was bright enough at between seven to eight in the morning to light up the clouds with its distinct impression.  other than that cloud, there were no other clouds in the sky at all.

after the first five minutes i had to refresh myself in the bathroom and came back to the window after a few monites and after having splashed my face with cold water, only to realise that i had not been dreaming.  i checked to see where the moon and sun were and needless to say, they were in different places in the sky that morning.  i could see the object behind the cloud and showing itself between the puffs.  the light was not coming from a beam or anything of that nature.  it was made of light and the cloud in front of it slowly disappeared to reveal itself more and more throughout the experience.

just two weeks before, a friend of mine (derek) and i were using the mantras connected with merkabah experiences in that very garden in 
riverclub.

the experience was such a shock that i found myself crying intermittently right through that day especially.  i wish i had broken my frozen stare when i went back to the window as my camera was in the next room and i would have a picture to show you.  it was due to amazement and shock that i didn't reach for it.


seven green craft in formation


my most recent sighting was in september of 2004.  i was telling my friend justin about some of my sightings two weeks before and had a feeling he would see one soon.  to my amazement, looking out of my kitchen in linden, i noticed seven deep emerald lights flying in jaggered formation slowly across the sky in the distance.  we both observed the silent encounter in amazement.  it lasted about a minute or so.  then, within a half hour, another one of our friend's called from the suburb of morningside about six kms away and expressed that he had seen two of them more close-up.  he described two emerald-green chinese-lantern-like objects silently breeze past him in the sky above.


a bright ball of light in the sky

 
since prof hurtak's lectures and even earlier, i have always wanted to see flying craft of higher spiritual worlds:  aged about sixteen in 1983 my father and i were travelling north out of the city of johannesburg on the m1.  we had just come back from the cinema.  it was late december and most people were away visiting the coast for the holiday season, so the roads were very empty.  it was a little after midnight, and there was a drizzle coming down from low-lying clouds.  my father was driving, coming round a major bend in the highway.  for a while i observed a small light in the distance, what at first seemed like a low-flying aeroplane taking off or landing.  however, it staid in the sky under the canopy.  the light grew brighter as it got closer until it was very clearly visible above the car.  its path was smooth, and then it hovered for about ten seconds.  of course, we were driving and so i was leaning more and more forward in the car to avoid seeing the object through the blue visor-strip on the windshield.

at that stage, i was not sure whether my father had seen it or not, and had refrained from saying anything in fear of ridicule.  but now i was sure this was nothing i had seen before.  it was a big, round ball of brilliant white light that seemed to be shinning inwards, and it did not emit a beam.  it was just sitting in the sky.  i had no option and said to louis, "look dad!"

he looked up and instantly the craft dashed diagonally down to the other side of the highway behind some bushes.  we both could scarcely believe the rapidity of this movement.  as he had not seen the craft stationary, the image left on his retina and upon his imagination was of a more elongated craft dashing towards the ground in preparation to crash in a big explosion.  he swerved the car across two lanes of highway throwing out his arm in front of me and shouting out by instinct.  he then proceeded to drive on, dazed and literally white in the face.  i could not persuade him to return immediately.  on arriving home, i persuaded wendy to backtrack.  it had gone, but the excitement of seeing it still lives on.

	someone switched the lights on in the sky

about a year and a half later, i saw something with two friends of mine, debbie and laurence, also while driving on the m1 north, but further out in sandton.  we observed normal, yellow-white lightning all around us as it was raining again, and had been for the last few hours.  

looking over the buildings in an industrial area on the left, suddenly we all saw a huge cloud suddenly lighting up with a more intense, blue-white light that seemed distinct from the thunder activity.  it might have been as much as half the horizon that was lit up as if in daylight, and we had now rolled back the sunroof to have a fuller look and slowed down the car to a halt. the light remained without flickering for about twenty seconds and then vanished.  it was so bright that the ground lit up bright enough to see the colours of the leaves on the trees and the green grass for all that time.

i had half forgotten about this experience when i had walked into a cafe-come-market in about the year 2000 in the suburb of norwood.  i bumped into debbie who i had not seen since about the time of the experience.  she immediately reminded me of it, and i began to wonder why i had blocked it from my conscious mind.  i think that my schema could not incorporate an object of such magnitude floating above some clouds, or i couldn���t comprehend how clouds could light up that way all by themselves, and i had passed it off as some freak of nature or something. 

      fluorescent tube in the sky

in late june 1999, i was at a party with lots of lights in a small garden of an acquaintance of mine (mark), and i began to feel uncomfortable with the low level of interactions i was observing.  i had a sensation that i was seeing through a weird social game and i thought of leaving.  i actually rolled my eyes and suddenly as i did so, i noticed a long cylinder about three times the size of a 747 with no windows, markings or wings but rather shining as a fluorescent light would.  it silently passed by for a brief moment (at most three seconds) and appeared from the bottom of one cloud moving in to another through a small gap in the canopy of clouds.  

no one else at the party had any inkling of it being there and it was travelling just above the bottom end of the clouds.  it would really have looked like attention-seeking if i had mentioned something at the time.  there was nothing more to see and frustratingly enough, there was no one to tell.  i left very soon thereafter.
content.summary: Off-spherical (like a human heart)

content.detailedDescription:
El mismo dia en la noche tratando de mirar el circulo rosado que vi en la tarde me encontraba esperando y observando el cielo cuando escuche muchos elicopteros alrededor de mi casa y observe que unas luces extranas aparecieron de repente,viajaban a gran velocidad los elicpteros tanbien se encontraban creo que por casualidad tanto que pude ver la diferencia entre uno y otro, y las luces eran diferentes y se apagaban y encendian a gran velocidad que tome video lo mas que pude, y del video tome unas fotos para ponerla aqui como evidencia.

despues mi hija me pidio que la acompanara a regresar unas peliculas,los elicopteros ya no se encontraban y las luces bolvieron y nos persiguieron asta el local de las peliculas, mi hija se encontraba asustada,y lo acepto de los nervios me dio un ataque de risa.
content.summary: Luces en el cielo

content.detailedDescription:
El dia 2o de diciembre me encontraba observando el vuelo de unas palomas,
y observe que un circulo rosado flotaba en el cielo y se movia despacio y al principio pense que era un globo,pero cuando un avion paso a gran distancia debajo de el se fue persiguiendo al avion cosa que me dio un poco de risa ya que parecia una caricatura.
eran aproximadamente las 6 de la tarde.
content.summary: Circulo rosado

content.detailedDescription:
Hi. my name is elizabeth wall. this photo was taken with my cell phone coming back in town on i-40 from the east mountains. at the time i didnt notice anything but this unusual cloud. it was like a rainbow.Arch shape . was pretty cool so i took a pic. i had me and my otherhalf and a friend were in the car. i even showed it to friend and he said cool but didnt catch it either. well i had uploaded photes to my computer. i had taken 2 pics of same cloud. second one has nothing it is gone in this one. but the first one i took there seemed to be a spot by the arch/rainbow cloud. so i blew it up and clearly its an object/s not sure if it is 2 or not it is possible i suppose the way it looks. it is something and kinda strangley out of place. since unfortunatly this photo was taken with cell phone its more pixled when u blow it up. but i believe with the right software program and all you might be able to see it better. i know its for sure an object. please oh please get back with me if you are able to also inhance photo i would love to see it. this was just a pic of a cool cloud and i got a cool surprize with it.It might be nothing but sure does look wild.

i have attached 3 photos. first one is original. second one is same cloud taken few seconds later with object gone. third pic is the same as the first photo, but a little darker so i could try to see it better. hope to hear back from you.


sincerely,
elizabeth wall
content.summary: Was seen near bottom right of the loop cloud

content.detailedDescription:
Hi. my name is elizabeth wall. this photo was taken with my cell phone coming back in town on i-40 from the east mountains. at the time i didnt notice anything but this unusual cloud. it was like a rainbow.Arch shape . was pretty cool so i took a pic. i had me and my otherhalf and a friend were in the car. i even showed it to friend and he said cool but didnt catch it either. well i had uploaded photes to my computer. i had taken 2 pics of same cloud. second one has nothing it is gone in this one. but the first one i took there seemed to be a spot by the arch/rainbow cloud. so i blew it up and clearly its an object/s not sure if it is 2 or not it is possible i suppose the way it looks. it is something and kinda strangley out of place. since unfortunatly this photo was taken with cell phone its more pixled when u blow it up. but i believe with the right software program and all you might be able to see it better. i know its for sure an object. please oh please get back with me if you are able to also inhance photo i would love to see it. this was just a pic of a cool cloud and i got a cool surprize with it.It might be nothing but sure does look wild.

i have attached 3 photos. first one is original. second one is same cloud taken few seconds later with object gone. third pic is the same as the first photo, but a little darker so i could try to see it better. hope to hear back from you.


sincerely,
elizabeth wall
content.summary: Was seen near bottom right of the loop cloud

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were driving northbound on lakeview avenue, we had just passed the kaiser hospital bldg.  on the corner of my right eye, above in the sky i saw a red light go zig zag like it was tracing something. it was fast, like it was drawing a star, but more like z. my sister mentioned as a red zig zag lightening bolt, which is good description of it.  i saw it, and paused. then my sister and i looked at each in shock.  she saw it, but also heard a loud sound with people yelling. i heard nothing but normal street noise, but we saw the same thing in the northeastern sky. after we saw it, we had to stop for a train on lakeview and orangethorpe.  we can get a more accurate time by pulling my sister's cell phone records. she had called her boyfriend right after it happened.  after i dropped of my sister off, and i called my husband. he told me to report it to mufon and then the call dropped. i was not able to get service for a couple of minutes. i tried calling both my sister and husband. i have been having problems with my service since, which i normally don't. i am scared and can't believe what i saw and looked away in shock.
content.summary: Red zig zag lightening bolt that retraced itself

content.detailedDescription: We were in our neighbors back yard. us kids were going to camp out in the back yard. someone said "look up at that in the sky" it was a bright star like object slowly moving across the sky. it suddenly stopped, pulsated, then shot across to another area of the sky. this thing stopped in a millisecond. it sat there still for a minute or two then pulsated again and shot off over the horizon. we were so taken we decided not to camp out. at that time we had an active nike missile base located just west of town on bee caves road. we also had bergstrom afb that housed b-52 aircraft. i do not know if there were any nuclear devices located there though but the base was very active. mind you, this was a crucial time in the world. i have been infatuated with aircraft since i was a little boy and have worked in the aviation industry all my life. i know what technology there was to know of at that time and we did not have anything that could do those types of maneuvers. i will remember this always just like it was yesterday and have always had a firm belief in ufo's since then...........Pl 12-21-06
content.summary: Object streaking-stopping-pulsating-streaking again-pulsating again-shooting off

content.detailedDescription: T we saw. the it turned on these little rede "beacon" lights that looked alot like the military helicopters we are accostemed to seeing on. we was like, noway. trhats bno chopper or [plane or kite or glider, not even a werater balloon. i didnt see little green men looking out port holes so im not saying this was extraterrestial, but it was a u.Fo...
content.summary: Eerie,unexplainable, and just unbeleivavle ce-2 event

content.detailedDescription: The date of this sighting is approximate. it occurred late spring early summer when i was about 10 years old in dayton, ohio. we lived 2 houses west of our lady of mercy church. it was after dark and the family was watching tv in the dining room. i looked east out the side porch window and saw the craft. it was oval from what i could tell with yellow light comming from what looked to be windows around the center of the craft. the craft was at 60'to 70' altitude judging from the tree height over which it was moving.The craft was at a distance of 150' to 200' from our house. i yelled for my family and they moved to the windows and saw the craft too. we then ran upstairs to get a better view of the craft. it moved slowly taking perhaps 20-30 seconds to move out of sight over the woods that bordered church property. while we were watching the craft a figure was seen inside who looked to be working controls of some sort. the figure was backlighted by the glow and i only was able to make out a dark human type shape. the following morning my brother and i went back in the woods where the craft had dissappered. about 200' inside the woods there was an area of crushed brush and even a couple broken saplings the largest being about 2&1/2 inches in diameter. this area was about 50' around circular. and about 20'to 25' apart in the center there were 4 holes. these holes were about 3" wide and 6" to 8" deep. for several years following this sighting very little grew in the crushed area, and what plants that did grow there were sickly as was a tree that was on the edge of the area. no sound was ever heard from the craft, and though the outline was rather vague due to the darkness, there was no sign or visible means of propultion, and a absence of any engine sound.
content.summary: Sighting & possible landing

content.detailedDescription:
I was just arriving home with my family (wife-28, son - 5, son - 1) from work and i was getting the mail as i normally do.  on my way to the mailbox, i always look to the sky because i'm interested in astronomy.  as i walk to my mailbox which is about 30 yards from my house and 15 yards from the end of my driveway, i look towards the south and west.  

this particular night, i noticed a bright white light in the sky almost as soon as i looked up.  it looked like a star and it was as bright as the brightest stars in the sky.  this white light was about 65-70 degrees in the sky, so fairly high up.  i noticed this light was moving faster than a star though.  my initial thought was that it was just a satellite.  a nice sighting but nothing exciting.  i looked closer and noticed a leading red light that was about 5 degrees in front of it.  this red light was not quite as bright, but was very noticeable, in fact at this point, i thought it might be mars.  however, it too was moving in tandem with the white light that was moving fast.

at this point, i realize this is something special and i tell my wife and son - 5, to come take a look.  they both immediately see what i'm looking at and witness the two objects.

we watch these objects move on the same line at the same speed (probably 1 degree a second in the sky), come towards the nne.  the red dot moves almost directly over my head and disappears at about 85 degrees.  the white dot follows the red and disappears in the exact same spot that the red dot just disappeared into about 3-5 seconds after the white dot disappeared.  my wife and i are just shaking our head's trying to figure out what just happened as the objects seemed to be very high in the sky (they seemed like satellites) and they just disappeared into thin air.  the sky was mostly clear to clear as i can remember, so i don't think they were lost behind clouds although i wouldn't put it out of the realm of possibilities.  the whole sighting went very quickly, 20 seconds, as these objects moved fairly quickly across the sky.  in my experience with satellites, this seemed to move faster than them.

thanks for reading.  please contact me if there were any similar sightings if you could.  also, if any space junk or satellites were in the vacinity.  the only thing with that is that i saw the 2 objects so far apart comparatively if they were as high as i thought they were, and the speed would be incredible if they were that high.  my wife could corroborate this story.

thanks again.
content.summary: Two lights - lead light red, following light white  5 degrees separation, extremely high moving quickly

content.detailedDescription:
Just bought some cigarettes and as i was in my mum's car and can't smoke in it i stopped along a country road and got out to smoke one. i was happily smoking when i saw this disc (about the size of a dime or a british 5 pence at arms reach) slowly fly over me.
it was grey no lights and no sound traveling about 50mph.
sorry but this is all i saw and it only lasted about a minute.
i am positive and sure as can be about what i saw it was a diffinent disc and was a dull grey in colour.
p.S it was cigarettes i was smoking nothing else.
at the time i couldn't believe what i was seeing and to this day i still can't explain what it was but all i can say is that it was a disc.
content.summary: No sound just quite slowly fly over me

content.detailedDescription: Was driving on paint mills road in knox township clarion county pa on december 16 at approx. 0645 noticed in eastern sky a large round white fireball with what appeared to be a comet-like tail at the end of it. did not appear to be moving fast and was able to see the moon to my right.  had slowed down to try to see it better, but trees blocked my field of vision.  drove approximately one mile to see object better but it had disappeared.  this all occured with in the time span of approximately one minute.  this object was also witnessed by my girlfriend who was in a separate car approximately 500' ahead of my location as well as a friend who witnessed this same object in marienville, pa; which is approximately 30-35 miles from where we witnessed this object
content.summary: Large ball with tail

content.detailedDescription:
I am a commercial boat captain and drive at night often. i do not drink or do drugs and hesitant to say this.
on night approaching boac chica naval airstation i saw a very large light come out of the sky at a mechanical 45 degree angle and stop and abruptly move horizontally for about 1/4 mile then stop and hover.
i thought i may have had a scratch on the lens of my protective glasses.
as i cleaned them, i saw the hovering light with the naked eye. when i
returned the glasses to my face i saw the light in the same place and height..Approx. 2,000 feet. 
there was no sound or movement and i checked my glasses again and when i returned to the objects' position it had disappeared. 
i came back in the morning to see if the navy was doing anything unusual and saw nothing.
i noticed the broad radar array at the base and realized one dome was in very close proximity to my sighting.  
 i saw no other reports in the newspaper or anywhere else so i kept this to myself. 

i seem to relive this moment each time i pass by this spot and look for it to appear again. 
i am sure of what i saw and i do not recognize it as a normal occurance.
content.summary: Huge light in the sky came down at 45 degree angle then moved horizontally

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were returning to nashville via commercial carrier, southwest airlines, on november 13th, 2006, close to ten am. i was seated by the window and observed a weather front approaching from a distance. as we flew closer to the clouds deliniating the front i noticed a large round/ovoid opening in the clouds. the aircraft was above the clouds, clear skies at 20,000 plus feet. when we were what i would estimate to be within a mile of the opening in the clouds, i happened to look out my window again and saw what could be mistaken for nothing other than a large cross like object rising out of the opening. this object was perfectly straight, with a "t-piece" very near the top. the object appeared to be a dark reddish-brown in color. i observed the object for roughly ten seconds before i could no longer see it from my window. we were flying on a north-westerly track and the sunlight was coming from slightly behind my position on the starboard side of the aircraft. unfortunately, our airliner was not close enough to view the interior of the opening in the clouds where this object was rising up from. the object did not move. i was perplexed and fascinated by viewing something that by reasonable logic, should not have been there. also, having studied weather formations and knowing a bit about them, i found the large opening in the clouds quite odd. as a note, i had not had any alcohol during the flightand was completely sober and awake when i viewed this anomoly. unfortunately, my camera was in the overhead bin at the time of this event.
i would be very interested in hearing if any one else has seen this type unusual event. feel free to contact me at www.Booksbybeck.Com and locate the email hyperlink. thank you
content.summary: Cross shaped object rising out of a cloud bank on initial descent into nashville, tn

content.detailedDescription:
The witness was very open and appeared credible. the following is an account of the event as told to me by the witness.
the witness was driving home from work on 4 november 2006 at approxometely 7:30 pm est and was about to cross a railroad track when she noticed, ���a baby blue ball of light with a white vapor trail in the sky.��� she then added,���i thought it was the prettiest shade of baby blue, then, just as my car dipped down while going over the tracks, i saw all this white smoke pass in front of my windshield and crash into the ground. the only thing that stopped it from hitting my car was that the car dipped when i went over the tracks otherwise i���m sure it would have hit the passenger side door of my car.��� 
the witness did not exit the car to investigate but instead proceeded home. she did not tell her husband about the event until the following morning. she wasn���t clear as to why she waited until the next morning, but her body language indicated she may have been timid about telling him what she had seen. 
the next morning she and her hussband went to the location to search for whatever it was that hit the ground. not knowing what they were looking for it took them over an hour before they located what they believed was the object. they collected a large fragment (approx 7 inches) and numerous smaller pieces.
i believee it was her husband who took over at that point and contacted the local university (valdosta state) and the newspaper (copy of valdosta times article attached).
content.summary: Witness observed blue sphere with what appeared to be a white vapor trail

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were in her spa in the backyard of her house at approx 11 oclock pm it was a hot night and the shy was clear all of a sudden a huge ball of light went across the sky from right to left about 100cm across but you could see it must have been massive i asked her if she saw it she had within seconds another huge ball of light went from left to right we both said what is going on then within seconds it was like the heavens opened like a huge curtain in a concert hall then there staitionary was this huge long cigar shaped mothership it was massive it looked from our view 200 metres long about 5 mtrs high it just sat there like it was parked on the road we were speachless i was like in a trance then after about 10 minutes dark patches came all over the ship and small disc shaped craft came out from the dark holes and danced all around they looked about 1000cm across there were 10 in all they were playing it seemed, my freind got up and totally naked got out of the spa and ran inside screaming get inside but i couldn't move i was in total awe and i was saying to the ship come and pick me up in my mind but alais nothing happened i watched for ages i was so calm but so excited and so numb trance like then just as the curtain had opened it closed and it was black again. i will never forget that in all my life.My friend told me i was a silly bitch for staying i told her i was begging them to pick me up she will never forget it either i just wished i had my camera.

another time i was with my husband travelling 300 klm up the coast we had a convertable all of a sudden a big bright light came on out of no where just off the road so huge we could not see the road then this huge wind came from no where and flattened the roof of the car, my husband who does not beleive said it was a tractor but what farmer works in scrubland at 1 am and what tractor has such a huge light it blinds you and what tractor creates enough wind to flatten the cars roof by the time we got to our destiny the roof had sprung back but we had to drive for kls holding it up and if it wasn't raining softly we would have put it down. that night i got a bit worried.
content.summary: Amazing skyshow then a mothership which then opened all around to release 10 small discs.

content.detailedDescription: before the thanksgiving holiday, i was opening my section at my job, i would always gaze out the window and enjoy the view from the mountains, around 9 after in the morning near south east of denver i believe, two objects caught my eye, they where close to the mountains and they where spread appart like the second time i send them, they where slowly hovering over the mountains they would move side to side and up and down, it freaked me out becuase i knew it wasn't a helicopter or airplane, i showed the tape to audio visual personel and they was finally convinved it wasn't a helicopter after we screen my footage the second time i saw them, i had to leave the window, i blew it off, becuase what was going in my mind, weather ballon,? so i had to return to my task of opening my section at my job and be responsible. but i knew i had to bring my camera and show co workers and aquantance of what i had seen, becuase still i don't believe what i saw, they where dark sphere, they look like they where rotating rapidly but was still in a slow mode.
content.summary: look out the window because of the nice weather, and two objects caught my eye, they where closer to the mountains, but they where spread apart from one another, i also seen them before the thanksgiving holiday as well, they where moving very slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in line at a zellers store in fergus ontario with 8 or 9 other people waiting for the store to open.  we were all aware that they would have the video game system we all wanted for xmas so we had to be in line before the store opened or we would not get it.  i showed up at 2:00 am and others arrived after that.  at 6:30 i happened to be looking south toward the city of guelph.  i saw what i thought at first was someone setting off a firework or flare.  a reddish orange ball shot up from the ground leaving a smoke trail underneath it.  when it reached it's apex in the air, it moved slowly east and then west and back to the east in a circle.  there was also a smoke trail of a circle where this manoever had occured.  then the object just blinked out and dissapeared.  i asked if anyone else in line had seen this and they all said yes.  there was many comments on how it was really weird.  there was no clouds in the sky that it could have gone behind or anything and like i said it did not shoot off in any direction it just dissapeared.  someone mentioned that they wondered if it was some sort of a plane that was having a problem.  someone else mentioned that they had heard there was solar flares occuring that day.  as all this commotion was going on the object suddenly appeared again exactly at the point where it had dissapeared.  this time though it was no longer red and orange it was a silvery colour.  the object had 2 red lights and a white light visible on it. then a bright white light shot out of it.  not towards the ground but out horizontally.  the light was brighter than any lights i have ever seen it was like a huge floodlight of some sort.  the light shone out from a single point but created a wide triangular like arc in the sky.  i then realised that i had my cellphone on me and i could take a picture of this object.  i fumbled getting out my cellphone to take a picture.  the object had now been visible this second time for approximately 30 seconds.  i snapped a picture of it and as soon as i snapped the picture about 1 second later it dissapeared again.  it did not shoot off real fast or anything, again it just dissapeared.  it left no smoke trail or anything showing which direction it went.  but the original smoke trail it left when it raised from the ground originally stayed visible for approximately 10 minutes.  none of us had ever seen anything like this before and none of us could explain away what it really was.  i do know one other person in line personally but i do not know who the other people are.  however when the store opened and we got our video game systems we all had to leave our name and phone number so zellers does have a record of everyone who saw this event if you would like to research this further.  i do not know how to get this picture to you but if you are interested in seeing this picture i still have it in my cellphone and if i am contacted you can explain to me how i can get this photo to you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Reddish orange ball shape rose from ground, dissapeared then reappeared shone bright light for 30 seconds and dissapeared again

content.detailedDescription:
Was fishing on ohio river with my wife.Noticed bright light moving upstream just above the water.At first i thought it was a helicopter until it stopped and enlarged to a circle about 50 feet across.The light was very bright white at first,then dimmed to a color that is hard to discribe,sort of a yellow orange.The size and color change happened together all at once.At this time i ask my wife to turn and tell me what she saw.She answered the moon, which i replied "look over your head" as the moon was above us.Next i asked what time is it? she told me the time and ask what the hell is that? i said what do you think it is? then the object started moving toward the kentucky side of the river.Stopping at the tree line.It appeared to turn and move back toward the ohio side of the river.About half way across it stopped suddenly as if it were aware we were watching it.Immediately upon stopping it shined a light on me the likes of which i have never seen.For lack of a better explaination i would call it a partical beam or like a bright white light with glitter all in it.My wife who was standing about twenty feet away off to the side of me said the beam came up my body feet first stopping above the knees and then retreated back to the object.The beam of light was just that a beam that only shone on me.The instant the light reached the object it vanished before our eyes.I am left with more questions about ufo's than i have ever had before.But one thing i can say i and my wife consider ourselves normal intelligent average everyday people.We saw something that we believe is not of this world.Also this sighting took place with the object only being fifty feet above the river and less than a mile away.During the sighting i got the distinct impression this is not good.After it left i wanted to stay and see if it would return.My wife felt uneasy and wanted to leave.We stayed about thirty minutes and left without incident.This is not my first encounter with lights up close and personal. however i have felt compelled to tell this story.Thanks. james d. packard  
p.S.The object made no sound we could hear during the whole incident.
content.summary: Light appeared over ohio river. stopped. hovered. shined beam of light on me. then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: A very bright slow moving fireball zigzaged across the se sky leaving a narrow white contrail then disappeared behind a small dark cloud. i personnally didn't see the fire ball, but i did look up and saw the strage contrail left behind. about a dozen men, whom i work with, did see the entire event.
content.summary: Fireball zigzaged across the se sky leaving a narrow white contrail

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my cell phone talking to my girlfriend and happend to look up and see a star moving. initially i thought it might be an airplane because this is an approach pattern to austin-bergstrom international airport. as it was moving, it then came to a sudden stop for approx. 2 minutes. it then proceeded to head in a north-northwest direction slowly and then stopped and proceeded on a southern heading. it stopped again for approximately a minute. after that it began to proceed sw and then curve back on a westerly heading. then the object began to be obscured by clouds. the clouds were thick enough to cover the stars but the object remained partially visible. it was evident that whatever this is it is above the clouds, but bright enough to shine through them. after the clouds came through there were occassional breaks in them, but then a thick patch came over and limited visibility for the duration of the sighting. the object began heading west again, slowly, when i lost it in the clouds.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like object over austin ( ongoing at this time )

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying in bed.   about 5 a.M. i saw the last crescent of the moonrise from my bedroom which faces the southeast.  i dozed on and off listening to the radio.  around 7 a.M. i looked out the window and there was a bright light, whereupon i put on my glasses and saw what looked like a big jagged lightning strike, but it was thicker than lightning and remained.  it started from the horizon, went left  and then back right.(it was jagged left and right like lightning)  it reminded me of the contrails you might see when you watch rockets take off from cape kennedy.  i went looking for my camera which didn't have batteries in it.  went back to the window, and to the left of the white lightning contrail, there was a glowing white light.  it looked like the moon thru a thinly veiled cloud.  but it wasn't the moon, because the moon had risen and had passed more to the south.  i could see the moon off to the right.   i went to look for batteries, still couldn't find them.  when i returned to the window the white ball of light was gone.  shortly after that the white contrails disappeared also.  by 7:09 all was gone. 

i watch a lot of sun rises from my bed during the winter months and this has never happened before.  the sun finally did appear on the horizon about 7:53 a.M.   so the lights weren't something from the sun.  

just wonder if anyone else reported seeing anything.  i'm located about 10 to 15 miles from the western pennsylvania border in ohio.  there's no way i could judge how far away it was, but there are no big cities or factories for at least 50 miles from my vantage point.
content.summary: Unusual contrail jutting up from horizon to sky, round circular light glowing

content.detailedDescription: Certainly not extraterrestrial, but odd.  trajectory almost precisely (apparently) east-west.  similar in behavior and speed to commercial airliner, but with only one contrail while flying, but odd for its time of day, apparent altitude (seemingly lower than trans-atlantic jet airliner), and flight corridor - no airplanes have ever been seen flying at that altitude, and certainly no trans-atlantic commercial jets.  after returned (20 seconds away) from getting my camera, the contrails (which had been straight) were wavy due to wind (no doubt), but the odd thing is that the ufo was still shining bright - probably reflection of the sun - sun was rising, but hadn't yet risen, but was apparently stationary.  it faded over the next minute.  i have a couple of photos of this.
content.summary: Possible rocket launched from md/va eastern shore

content.detailedDescription: Outside infront of my house on a clear night i streached my back and when i looked up i saw this object at about 25,000 ft stationary in the eastern sky. it appeared to be the size of a football field. it was disc shaped with white lights all around it and a few at the center of the bottom. it appeared metallic. it shot a short distance to the south then remained stationary again. then it headed east over miami beach at a tremendous speed twoards the atlantic ocean. possibly the size of a diamond-ball (larger than a baseball) at arms length. entire episode took approximately 5 minutes. i am sure this was no plane, balloon, blimp or helicoptor. i have watched the skys all my life and i do not believe this was man made.
content.summary: Like a disc,metallic, had white lights around ship and some at center of bottom

content.detailedDescription: It was approx. 8 pm. i was walking the streets of our neighborhood (farmingdale, new york)with my brother, my cousin and 3 neighbors when we realized that the light of the moon all of a sudden got dark.  my cousin screamed look up!  when we did we saw (approx. 100 yards over our heads) a disk shaped obect the size of half a football field hoovering over our heads.  the object blocked out the moon. however, being that the moon was behind the object it lit up the object so that we could see it very clearly. the object had different colored lights (red, blue, white, yellow) around the parameter and a large yellow dome in the middle.  it just hoovered without any sound.  i got so frighten that i ran into some bushes hiding from it.  my brother kept calling me over to him.  i finally ran back to him and the group.  the object was still hoovering motion-less!  after, what felt like hours, the object took off at a 45 degree angle.  within seconds the object went from the size of half a football field to the size of one of the stars in the sky.  then it stopped moving and stood in one spot for a long period of time.  if we didn't see it prior to that, we would have confused it for one of the stars in the sky.  25 years later my brother, my cousin and myself were at a family reunion and were asked by other family members (who knew what we had saw years ago) for each of us to draw what we saw, and to draw the pictures while seated at different tables.  our drawings were basically identical.
content.summary: Me, my brother, my cousin and 2 neighbors were walking on a street in our development when we saw the disk obect over our heads approx. 100 yards

content.detailedDescription:
We were traveling in a motor home east on i. 70  about 60 miles from salina,kansas when we saw two extremely bright light which we thought were from a football field.  we wondered about them and noticed they stayed the exact same distance from us as we traveled east.  after about fifteen miles we decided it was strange they were still there and at the exact same height and distance from us.  this was a very eerie feeling that something is watching you.

all of a sudden the lights were gone so we thought nothing of it. we traveled about fifteen miles farther and the lights appeared again exactly in the same location.  they kept following us for about five miles and we decided to get the v c r camera and we stopped the motor home.  we stpopped the motor home and opened the door to get a better view, when we started filming, the light on the right suddenly veered off to the right and the other light disappeared completely.  that was when we decided there were two objects instead of just one.

we managed to get only a few seconds of the lights when it veered off.  it was very obvious whatever we were seeing knew what we were doing. we were very nervous knowing that ever we saw also was watching us and did not want any pictures taken. 

i know we were followed about 40 miles total.

we stopped at a truck stop in salina,kansas and another car pulled in with some hunters in it and they also saw the lights and were very nervous about seeing the lights.

i have the film with the light but it is only a very few seconds showing the lights. i do not want to send the tape for fear of loosing it but i do have it for the right people to see.
content.summary: Traveling i 70 e. and saw lights, took pictures, lights disappeared,have picture of lights
